content: To make matters worse, there's no invisible walls to stop you from falling to your death when crossing the bridge, which the Clawed Cocoons AND Dragonfly Guai archer at the far end will absolutely use to their advantage to knock you around as you try to cross. While you can use the Thrust Stance to safely poke a few early cocoons, the strategy won't hold very long, and it's almost impossible to target the actual enemies and not the regular cocoons.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Cliff of Oblivion'.
The content is as follows:
To make matters worse, there's no invisible walls to stop you from falling to your death when crossing the bridge, which the Clawed Cocoons AND Dragonfly Guai archer at the far end will absolutely use to their advantage to knock you around as you try to cross. While you can use the Thrust Stance to safely poke a few early cocoons, the strategy won't hold very long, and it's almost impossible to target the actual enemies and not the regular cocoons.
